dc:title: On Pilgrimage - April 1952
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Celebrates the feast of the Annunciation with frolicking grand children, kissing the springtime earth. Complains of fatigue and morning stiffness. Laments her inefficiency but recommends relaxing prayer, even in the midst of the disorder of happy children.
